actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce, (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-657.

official_title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Commerce.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-657) Authorizes the expenditure of $2,360,000 by the Senate Committee on Commerce for studies and investigations. Allocates $260,000 to continue the study of the purpose and current effectiveness of specified Federal agencies. Provides that no more than $150,000 of such amount may be expended for the procurement of consultants. Requires the Committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Commerce.
